revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM20710; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://docs.cubieboard.org/tutorials/cubietruck/start ''Cubietruck'' on '''Wiki'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Cubietruck ''Cubietruck'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cubieboard#Cubietruck_.28Cubieboard3.29 ''Cubieboard'' on '''Wikipedia'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/cubitech/cubitech_cubietruck |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/cubietech/cubietruck |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa7 |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 17.01.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, (2.4/5GHz) [[Category:English Documentation]]
